name: Plane War
description: Plane War is an old-school scroller with pixel graphics and a pleasant musical accompaniment. You control an airplane that must shoot down enemy aircraft.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.6Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 140 MB available space
